summary: Build a professional blue-and-white themed marketing website for Discademia, an online tutoring platform for O/A level students, including an inviting welcome intro and sections for 1:1 tutoring, faculty, notes/mark schemes, and live sessions.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Discademia logo, clean academic style, blue on white (discademia-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Hero illustration featuring a student studying with subtle academic icons, minimal modern vector style, blue-and-white palette (discademia-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, single-page marketing website for “Discademia” (online tutoring platform for O/A level students) with a professional blue-and-white theme applied consistently across typography, buttons, section backgrounds, and interactive states.
Add a top navigation header with the Discademia brand and anchor links that scroll to each section: Welcome/Intro, 1:1 Tutoring, Faculty, Notes & Mark Schemes, Live Sessions.

Implement a Welcome/Intro hero section with inviting, professional messaging for Discademia, including a short headline, supporting paragraph, and primary call-to-action button (e.g., “Book a Free Consultation” or “Get Started”).

Add a “1:1 Tutoring Classes” section describing personalized tutoring, subjects/coverage (without inventing specific subject lists unless framed generically), how sessions work, and key benefits in a scannable layout (cards or bullet points).

Add an “Introducing Faculty” section that presents faculty profiles in a grid (e.g., 3–6 cards) with name, role/specialty, short bio, and optional credentials; keep copy professional and non-fictional (use generic placeholders clearly labeled as examples if real names are not provided).

Add a “Notes & Mark Schemes” section describing availability of study notes and mark schemes, how students can use them, and what formats/support are offered (kept general unless specific formats are provided).

Add a “Live Sessions” section describing interactive live learning sessions, what students can expect (Q&A, exam practice, revision), and how to join (kept general; no external integrations required).

Add a footer with Discademia branding and simple contact placeholders (e.g., email and/or social links) without requiring external services; include a short tagline appropriate for an O/A Level tutoring platform.

Add the required generated static images to the frontend as static assets and render them in the appropriate sections (logo in header/footer; hero illustration in the intro). Store generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Discademia website with an inviting, professional welcome/intro section
Apply a blue-and-white professional visual theme across the site
Add a site section describing 1:1 tutoring classes
Add a site section introducing faculty
Add a site section for notes and mark schemes
Add a site section for live sessions
